Name: Caveman The Game
About the game: Even in Prehistoric times love existed. Play as the Caveman and help him rescue the love of his life who has been taken by a gang of rebel cavemen. Lead the Caveman through 20 levels of jumping over tarpits, climbing vines and fighting dinosaurs to free his love from the clutches of the rebel caveman gang! This is single-player side-scroller that has been completely HAND-DRAWN! This game was created by a Father and Son duo who enjoy fun and challenging side-scroll games.
